org.openremote.entities.panel

Class ButtonWidget

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openremote.entities.panel.Widget
      • org.openremote.entities.panel.ButtonWidget
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommandWidget, NotifyPropertyChanged, ResourceChangedCallback, ResourceConsumer

    public class ButtonWidget
extends Widget
implements CommandWidget
    Button widget that sends a command on press (behaves differently depending on the ButtonWidget.Type); simply change state to trigger the send behaviour. TODO: Implement long press command functionality
    • ButtonWidget.Type.SHORTPRESS = Send short press command once as soon as state changes to ButtonWidget.State.SHORT_PRESSED
    • ButtonWidget.Type.SHORTPRESS_REPEATER = Send short press command repeatedly as soon as state changes to ButtonWidget.State.SHORT_PRESSED repeat period is determined by getRepeatDelay()
    • ButtonWidget.Type.LONGPRESS = Send long press command once after state has been set to ButtonWidget.State.LONG_PRESSED for longer than {link #getLongPressDelay}
    • ButtonWidget.Type.LONGPRESS_REPEATER = Send long press command repeatedly after state has been set to ButtonWidget.State.LONG_PRESSED for longer than getLongPressDelay() repeat period is determined by getRepeatDelay()
    • ButtonWidget.Type.SHORT_AND_LONGPRESS = Send short press command once and as soon as state changes to ButtonWidget.State.SHORT_PRESSED then send long press command after getLongPressDelay() delay has passed with changes state to ButtonWidget.State.LONG_PRESSED
    Author:
    Richard Turner
